pull.title: qa: Fix inv race in example_test
pull.body:
There have been intermittent test failures on this script.

```py
  File "./test/functional/example_test.py", line 216, in run_test
    assert_equal(block, 1)
AssertionError: not(2 == 1)
```

Probably the simplest way to fix them is overriding the `on_inv` method, so that no "colliding" getdata for the blocks are sent out.

Additionally, all getdata are now sent in a single message.

events.message: qa: Fix inv race in example_test

events.body:
utACK

Perhaps we should get rid of the default `on_inv` behavior altogether in `NodeConnCB`?  I don't think there's a good reason for its existence.
Good suggestion. Though, I am going to leave it for later, as it requires a bit more review than this small fix.
